Module atu.software
Package ie.atu.sw

Class TileMatrix

java.lang.Object
ie.atu.sw.TileMatrix
public class TileMatrix extends Object
TileMatrix encapsulates the byte matrix, and array of Sprite for that tile matrix.

    • loadMatrixFromFile

      public static TileMatrix loadMatrixFromFile(String fileName, Sprite[] spriteList) throws FileNotFoundException
      Loads a matrix of tiles from a file and returns a TileMatrix object.
      Parameters:
      fileName - the name of the file to load the matrix from.
      spriteList - an array of Sprite to use for the tiles in the matrix
      Returns:
      a TileMatrix object containing the matrix.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the matrix file can't be found.
